attributes.action: Convicted UK rioters should lose all benefits
attributes.additional_details:
To quote Stephen Mains "Any persons convicted of criminal acts during the current London riots should have all financial benefits removed. No tax payer should have to contribute to those who have destroyed property, stolen from their community and shown a disregard for the country that provides for them."


I suggest that this should be nationwide rather than just London as other cities within the UK have also suffered.
